title: Israelgogo
author: Israelgogo
content: Different sources of income not relying on one stream of income help to save you and give you a constant monthly inflow and means of livelyhood.take advantage of any means that can generate profit for you, do not be limited to one sources of income, give chances fir different taps and sources of generating revenue.Investments,assets ,real estate ,share, forex,btc's/crypto, salary, business partnership and associates.Give room for more and be ready to take the risk dat comes with it, challenge yourself for greatness.

comments.author: bmwister
comments.body: What do you mean by risks?

comments.author: Cryptodebjoe
comments.body: When talking about multiple sources of income it's important to understand that it doesn't necessarily have to be so for beginners I believe that it's important that you have a base(this could be a business or salary job) that can be a point source that you now use to build a foundation for other businesses but getting a loan and beginning to invest in different ideas could be disastrous because some of those income generating platforms or ideas haven't been tasted yet this could lead to frustration so I'd advise mastery in a given area before multiple investment....

comments.author: Sanni_w
comments.body: Since I started working in a company, my mind has not been in peace thinking I could get fired at anytime, now looking for another source of income, doing a business might be a good idea. Thanks for sharing üôè

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: Creating new streams of income is not easy, it‚Äôs not just something that can be started & guaranteed to continue long term. You can invest in stocks, crypto, real estate but you need a substantial amount of capital to start with. For the average guy it might not be possible but the first thing you need is a steady job. Minimise your spending so you can save up that all important initial capital.

comments.author: Van King
comments.body: How about earning some income through affiliate program?

comments.author: Jia Yan
comments.body: Affiliate program is one of the easier way to earn. I have join an online casino affiliate program which the casino named is BK8. It was the easiest for me to earn my side income.

comments.author: Van King
comments.body: How do you do to earn through the program?

comments.author: Jia Yan
comments.body: Refer normal player: You will be receiving an MYR 100 reward bonus for every referee if your referee fulfils a deposit requirement of MYR 250 within 30 days.Refer VIP player: Your referee is required to make an accumulated deposit amount of MYR 50,000 within 30 days of registration to be promoted as VIP (Bronze and above). Both of you will be receiving MYR 1,000¬†cash¬†reward

comments.author: Van King
comments.body: So it's promoting the casino to earn income. That's very easy.

comments.author: kirya
comments.body: Are there e-commerce retailers here? I started this kind of business and I hope to have an additional income from it soon. But I'm still clueless about some things. How often do you change your prices? Seasonal or based on your competitors? How do you approach these two different strategies? Thanks in advance.
